title: Car parts - Data analysis with arrays FRQ partial

content.question:
Complete method  getPossibleAssemblies.
 /**
 * Returns the number of assemblies that can be made from
 * all the parts on all the shelves. Each assembly requires
 * 2 wheels and 1 axle.
 * Preconditions: shelfArray is not null.
 * no elements of ShelfArray are null.
 * Postcondition: shelfArray is unchanged.
 */
public int getPossibleAssemblies()

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
